sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const SuccessPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ FullName: "", RequiredID: "", RequiredTitle: "", Role: "", RequiredCreationDate: "", VendorID: "", ImmigrationStatus: "", ContractType: "", SubmissionDate: "", RequiredSubmissionEndDate: "", CandidateCurrentLocation: "", ContactNumber: "", RecruiterName: "", State: "", SubmissionStatus: "", VendorRate: "", CandidatePayRate: "", BillRateMargin: "", ResumeSource: "", EmailId: "", LinkedInID: "", EmployerInformation: "", ProfessionalReferences: "", DOB: "", RequiredSkills: "", ResumeFormatingNeeded: "", FormatedBy: "", Password: "", PasswordConfirmation: "", Resume: null, // Handle file uploads separately if needed }); const [validation, setValidation] = useState({ // Initially, all fields are considered valid FullName: true, RequiredID: true, RequiredTitle: true, Role: true, RequiredCreationDate: true, VendorID: true, ImmigrationStatus: true, ContractType: true, SubmissionDate: true, RequiredSubmissionEndDate: true, CandidateCurrentLocation: true, ContactNumber: true, RecruiterName: true, State: true, SubmissionStatus: true, VendorRate: true, CandidatePayRate: true, BillRateMargin: true, ResumeSource: true, EmailId: true, LinkedInID: true, EmployerInformation: true, ProfessionalReferences: true, DOB: true, RequiredSkills: true, ResumeFormattingNeeded: true, FormattedBy: true, Password: true, PasswordConfirmation: true, Resume: true, }); const [uploadedFileName, setUploadedFileName] = useState(""); // State to hold the uploaded file's name for display const [showPopup, setShowPopup] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { id, value, files } = e.target; if (id === "Resume") { const file = files[0]; const allowedTypes = [ "application/pdf", "application/msword", "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document", ]; // Check if the file type is allowed if (!allowedTypes.includes(file.type)) { alert("Only PDF or DOC files are allowed."); setValidation((prevValidation) => ({ ...prevValidation, Resume: false, })); return; // Exit the function without setting the file } // Check if the file size is greater than 10 MB if (file.size > 10 * 1024 * 1024) { alert("The file uploaded should be less than 10 MB."); setValidation((prevValidation) => ({ ...prevValidation, Resume: false, })); return; // Exit the function without setting the file } // If the file passes both checks, update formData and validation state setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, Resume: file })); setValidation((prevValidation) => ({ ...prevValidation, Resume: true })); } else { // For all other inputs, update formData and perform validation setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [id]: value })); setValidation((prevValidation) => ({ ...prevValidation, [id]: value.trim() !== "", })); } }; // const handleSubmit = (event) => { // event.preventDefault(); // const allFieldsFilled = Object.entries(formData).every(([key, value]) => { // if (key === "Resume") { // return value !== null; // Specific check for file upload // } else { // return value.trim() !== ""; // Check for non-empty string for all other fields // } // }); // if (!allFieldsFilled) { // alert( // "Please fill out all fields and upload a resume before submitting." // ); // return; // } // // Proceed with form submission logic // console.log(JSON.stringify(formData)); // For demonstration // setShowPopup(true); // }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); let isFormValid = true; const newValidation = {}; Object.keys(formData).forEach((key) => { const isValid = validateField(key, formData[key]); newValidation[key] = isValid; if (!isValid) isFormValid = false; }); setValidation(newValidation); if (isFormValid) { console.log("Form data:", formData); // Proceed with form submission like sending data to a server alert("Form submitted successfully!"); } else { alert("Please fill in all required fields and upload a resume."); } }; const handleClosePopup = () => { setShowPopup(false); window.location.reload(); // Reloads the page }; return (

Employee Information Form

or drag and drop

PDF, DOC up to 10MB

{showPopup && (

Submission Successful

Your form has been submitted successfully.

)}
); }; export default SuccessPage;
